verses.verse: Again <S%G3825><s%> he began <S%G756><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the seaside. <S%G2281><s%> A <S%G3793><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> was gathered <S%G4863><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> he <S%G846><s%> entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a <S%G3793><s%> boat <S%G4143><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3793><s%> sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> down. <S%G2532><s%> All the <S%G3793><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> were on <S%G1909><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> by <S%G4314><s%> the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

He taught <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G846><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> parables, <S%G3850><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> told <S%G3004><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> teaching, <S%G1322><s%>
"Listen! <S%G191><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the farmer <S%G4687><s%> went out <S%G1831><s%> to sow, <S%G4687><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> it happened, <S%G1096><s%> as <S%G1722><s%> he sowed, <S%G4687><s%> some <S%G3303><s%> seed fell <S%G4098><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the road, <S%G3598><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the birds <S%G4071><s%> <S%G3772><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> devoured <S%G2719><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

Others <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the rocky ground, <S%G4075><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> it had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G4183><s%> little <S%G3756><s%> soil, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> it sprang up, <S%G1816><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> it had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> depth <S%G899><s%> of soil. <S%G1093><s%>

When <S%G393><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> had risen, <S%G393><s%> it was scorched; <S%G2739><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> it had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> root, <S%G4491><s%> it withered away. <S%G3583><s%>

Others <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the thorns, <S%G173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the thorns <S%G173><s%> grew up, <S%G305><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> choked <S%G4846><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it yielded <S%G1325><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

Others <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> into the good <S%G2570><s%> ground, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> yielded <S%G1325><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> growing up <S%G305><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> increasing. <S%G837><s%> Some <S%G1520><s%> brought forth <S%G5342><s%> thirty <S%G5144><s%> times, <S%G1520><s%> some sixty <S%G1835><s%> times, <S%G2532><s%> and some <S%G1520><s%> one hundred times as much. <S%G1540><s%>"
He said, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G846><s%> "Whoever has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>"

When <S%G3753><s%> he was <S%G1096><s%> alone, <S%G2651><s%> those who were around <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the parables. <S%G3850><s%>

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "To you <S%G5213><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> the <S%G1097><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> to those <S%G1565><s%> who are outside, <S%G1854><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> are done <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> parables, <S%G3850><s%>

that <S%G2443><s%> <S%G991><s%> 'seeing they may see, <S%G991><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> perceive; <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> they may hear, <S%G191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> understand; <S%G4920><s%> lest perhaps <S%G3379><s%> they should turn <S%G1994><s%> again, <S%G2532><s%> and their sins <S%G265><s%> should be forgiven <S%G863><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>'"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Don't <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G1492><s%> understand this <S%G3778><s%> parable? <S%G3850><s%> How <S%G2532><s%> will <S%G4459><s%> you <S%G1492><s%> understand <S%G1097><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of the parables? <S%G3850><s%>
The farmer <S%G4687><s%> sows <S%G4687><s%> the word. <S%G3056><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> The <S%G1526><s%> ones <S%G3778><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the road <S%G3598><s%> are the ones where <S%G3699><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> is sown; <S%G4687><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they have heard, <S%G191><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> takes away <S%G142><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> which has been sown <S%G4687><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> them. <S%G2588><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> in the same <S%G3668><s%> way <S%G3668><s%> are those who <S%G3739><s%> are sown <S%G4687><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the rocky places, <S%G4075><s%> who, <S%G3739><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they have heard <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> it <S%G846><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> joy. <S%G5479><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> root <S%G4491><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> but <S%G235><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> short-lived. <S%G4340><s%> <S%G1534><s%> When <S%G1096><s%> oppression <S%G2347><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> persecution <S%G1375><s%> arises <S%G1096><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the word, <S%G3056><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> they stumble. <S%G4624><s%>
Others <S%G3778><s%> are those <S%G1526><s%> who are sown <S%G4687><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the thorns. <S%G173><s%> These are those who have heard <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> the cares <S%G3308><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> age, <S%G165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the deceitfulness <S%G539><s%> of riches, <S%G4149><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> other things <S%G3062><s%> entering in <S%G1531><s%> choke <S%G4846><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it becomes <S%G1096><s%> unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

Those <S%G3778><s%> which were <S%G1526><s%> sown <S%G4687><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> ground <S%G1093><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> those <S%G3748><s%> who hear <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> accept <S%G3858><s%> it, <S%G2532><s%> and bear fruit, <S%G2592><s%> some <S%G1520><s%> thirty <S%G5144><s%> times, <S%G2532><s%> some <S%G1520><s%> sixty <S%G1835><s%> times, <S%G2532><s%> and some <S%G1520><s%> one hundred times. <S%G1540><s%>"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "Is <S%G3385><s%> the lamp <S%G3088><s%> brought <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> be put <S%G5087><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a basket <S%G3426><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> a bed? <S%G2825><s%> Isn't <S%G3756><s%> it <S%G2443><s%> put <S%G2007><s%> on a stand? <S%G1909><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> nothing <S%G5100><s%> hidden, <S%G2927><s%> except <S%G3361><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> it should <S%G1437><s%> be made known; <S%G5319><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> was anything made <S%G1096><s%> secret, <S%G614><s%> but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G1519><s%> it should come <S%G2064><s%> to light. <S%G5318><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear, <S%G191><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>"

He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Take heed <S%G991><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you hear. <S%G191><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> measure <S%G3358><s%> you measure, <S%G3354><s%> it will be measured <S%G3354><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> more will be given <S%G4369><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> who hear. <S%G191><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> whoever <S%G302><s%> has, <S%G2192><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> will more be given, <S%G1325><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he who <S%G3739><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> have, <S%G2192><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> he has <S%G2192><s%> will be taken <S%G142><s%> away from <S%G575><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>"

He said, <S%G3004><s%> "The <S%G3779><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> should cast <S%G906><s%> seed <S%G4703><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> should sleep <S%G2518><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rise <S%G1453><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the seed <S%G4703><s%> should spring <S%G985><s%> up <S%G3373><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> grow, <S%G846><s%> he doesn't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> how. <S%G5613><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> bears fruit: <S%G2592><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> the blade, <S%G5528><s%> then <S%G1534><s%> the ear, <S%G4719><s%> then <S%G1534><s%> the <S%G4621><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> grain <S%G4621><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G4621><s%> ear. <S%G4719><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the fruit <S%G2590><s%> is ripe, <S%G3860><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> he puts forth <S%G3860><s%> the sickle, <S%G1407><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> the harvest <S%G2326><s%> has come. <S%G3936><s%>"

He said, <S%G3004><s%> "How <S%G5101><s%> will we liken <S%G3666><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> will we illustrate <S%G3846><s%> it? <S%G846><s%>

It <S%G5613><s%>'s like a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard seed, <S%G4615><s%> which, <S%G3739><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> it is sown <S%G4687><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> though it is <S%G2076><s%> less than <S%G3398><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the seeds <S%G4690><s%> that are <S%G3588><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%>

yet <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> it is sown, <S%G4687><s%> grows up, <S%G305><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> becomes <S%G1096><s%> greater than <S%G3187><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the herbs, <S%G3001><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> puts out <S%G4160><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> branches, <S%G2798><s%> so that <S%G5620><s%> the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the sky <S%G3772><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> lodge <S%G2681><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> its <S%G846><s%> shadow. <S%G4639><s%>"

With <S%G5108><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> parables <S%G3850><s%> he <S%G2980><s%> spoke the word <S%G3056><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> they were able <S%G1410><s%> to hear it. <S%G191><s%>

Without <S%G5565><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> he <S%G2980><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> speak to them; <S%G846><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> privately <S%G2398><s%> to <S%G3101><s%> his <S%G846><s%> own disciples <S%G3101><s%> he explained <S%G1956><s%> everything. <S%G3956><s%>

On <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G2250><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> when <S%G1096><s%> evening <S%G3798><s%> had come, <S%G1096><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "Let <S%G1330><s%>'s go over to <S%G1519><s%> the other side. <S%G4008><s%>"

Leaving <S%G863><s%> the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> they took <S%G3880><s%> him <S%G846><s%> with them, <S%G5613><s%> even as he was, <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the boat. <S%G4143><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> small boats <S%G4142><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

A <S%G2978><s%> big <S%G3173><s%> wind <S%G417><s%> storm <S%G2978><s%> arose, <S%G1096><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the waves <S%G2949><s%> beat <S%G1911><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boat, <S%G4143><s%> so much that <S%G5620><s%> the <S%G846><s%> boat <S%G4143><s%> was <S%G1072><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> filled. <S%G1072><s%>

He <S%G846><s%> himself was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the stern, <S%G4403><s%> asleep <S%G2518><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the cushion, <S%G4344><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they woke <S%G1326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up, <S%G2532><s%> and told <S%G3004><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> care <S%G3199><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we are dying? <S%G622><s%>"

He awoke, <S%G1326><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the wind, <S%G417><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the sea, <S%G2281><s%> "Peace! <S%G4623><s%> Be still! <S%G5392><s%>" The <S%G2532><s%> wind <S%G417><s%> ceased, <S%G2869><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a <S%G1055><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> calm. <S%G1055><s%>

He said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Why <S%G5101><s%> are you <S%G2075><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> afraid? <S%G1169><s%> How is it that <S%G4459><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> faith? <S%G4102><s%>"

They were greatly <S%G3173><s%> afraid, <S%G5399><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G687><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> him? <S%G846><s%>"
